English: I enjoy playing soccer in my free time.
Spanish: Me gusta jugar fútbol en mi tiempo libre.

English: My sister loves to read books.
Spanish: Mi hermana le gusta leer libros.

English: My parents are going on a cruise next month.
Spanish: Mis padres van en crucero próximamente.

English: We have a big family dinner every Sunday.
Spanish: Todos los domingos tenemos una gran cena familiar.
